messages.title: For the last 18 years as your MP,
messages.content: I have worked hard for you in Harborough, regardless of your age, colour or creed. I am determined to do so again. This election is vital for the future of our country. Please help me to ensure a better future for Britain, for you, and for your families.

messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR EDWARD GARNIER

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To put Britain back on its feet, cut the deficit, and keep mortgage rates low, we need to change.
To improve the NHS and our schools, tackle welfare dependency and the causes of poverty, we need to change.
To return power over your lives to you, the people, by making politics more transparent, we need to change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for anyone else will only help Gordon Brown cling onto power.

issues.economy: To put Britain back on its feet, cut the deficit, and keep mortgage rates low, we need to change.
issues.education: To improve our schools, we need to change.
issues.governance: To return power over your lives to you, the people, by making politics more transparent, we need to change.
issues.health: To improve the NHS, we need to change.
issues.socialWelfare: To tackle welfare dependency and the causes of poverty, we need to change.

contactInformation.address: Conservative Campaign HQ, 24 Nelson Street, Market Harborough, LE16 9AY

images.caption: Edward Garnier and his team called to see you today
